title: Teammates, Friends of Lamar Odom React to News of His Hospitalization
text:
Share Article 
Harry How/Getty Images (NEW YORK) â€” Lamar Odom was found unconscious at the Love Ranch, a legal brothel in Crystal, Nevada, Tuesday and has since been hospitalized in Las Vegas for further treatment, authorities said.Former teammates and friends took to social media to pray for Odom, as news broke that the former NBA champion and reality star was found unresponsive.L.A. Lakers coach Byron Scott told ESPN, "It's obviously something that you don't want to hear before the game because I think the people that knew about it, we were all thinking about it. ... I obviously feel for him and hope that he'll be OK."Metta World Peace, formerly Ron Artest, played with Odom and the two were close friends since childhood in Queens, New York."I don't even know what to say. There's not one word that I can say right now that's going to make sense. I don't know what to say right now," he said.Here are others who are hoping Odom can pull through. PRAYERS all the way UP for my brother Lamar Odom!!!
